message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering I'm making the first move, and you get a solid $4000 right away without risking inflation.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think a 50-50 split would be more fair. This gives us each $5000, which is an equitable division. Since inflation doesn't affect me, I can negotiate patiently, but I'm offering you a reasonable equal split right now to conclude our negotiation efficiently.
